title: Find Familiar
content:
Eldritch Knight (Fighter) Arcane Trickster (Rogue) Warlock Pact of the Chain Pact Boon

Find Familiar can be cast by using the following Items:

Scroll of Summon Quasit

Find Familiar Tips & Notes

Any character with Scratch's Ball can summon Scratch. Scratch will automatically be dismissed if his summoner returns to camp. Find Familiar is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. Rangers, at creation (level 1), can choose one of the five available Natural
